quotes.quote: Choose a challenge instead of competence.
Choose to be happy, because you always have the choice.
It is easy to give up than to endure. Always choose the latter.
All is context. Choose yours carefully, where you have a choice.
Choose to experience peace rather than conflict.
If we choose the wrong road, we choose the wrong destination.
One can choose one's attitude in any given set of circumstances.
Choose what is best, and habit will make it pleasant and easy.
Words are confessions of your actions. Choose them wisely.
Choose your love, Love your choice.
Choose to be pro-active, assertive and self-defining.
We have to pick and choose between good and a little bit better.
Whatever choice you make makes you. Choose wisely.
Choose to be a love-finder rather than a faultfinder.
Choose a career you love and you will never have to go to work.
Choose your friends carefully. Your enemies will choose you.
Sometimes you have to choose between a bunch of wrong choices and no right ones. You just have to choose which wrong choices feels the least wrong.
We can only choose whether we will feel and not what we will feel.
You can choose what you do, you cant choose what you like to do.
Everything really is beautiful if you choose to see it that way.
In times of weakness, choose to put yourself under God's control.
You can't choose your potential, but you can choose to fulfill it.
Every time you choose to love, you have also just chosen to die.
Purpose is the quality we choose to shape our lives around.
God chooses what we go through. We choose how we go through it.
Words can inspire and words can destroy. Choose yours well.
Never choose the easy path. Choose the one that has morals.
If peace is really what you want, then you will choose peace.
Always choose the hardest way, on it you will not find opponents.
Nobody should have to choose between a cold heart and a dead heart.
Choose positive attitude over a negative attitude.
When you choose to perceive Love over fear, life begins to flow.
Choose life, choose to be happy and make somebody smile.
Life is an Attitude. It's what you Choose to Believe, ALWAYS.
We choose our joys and sorrows long before we experience them.
If we choose, we can live in a world of comforting illusion.
The way we choose to see the world creates the world we see.
Choose people who lift you up.
Create your own fears; choose to fear living an average life.
Authors do not choose a story to write, the story chooses us.
Our greatest freedom is the freedom to choose our attitude.
Choose your friends carefully. They are a reflection of you.
Choose between yesterday and tomorrow.
Choose being kind over being right and you'll be right every time.
The girl who chooses to be modest, chooses to be respected.
You must choose to live by enouragement rather than by expectations.
When you choose a habit, you also choose the end of that habit.
Sometimes you don't choose the material; the material chooses you.
Happiness is a choice. Choose to be happy and you will be.
The story you choose to tell isn't always the story you believe.
